long_description: Offering efficient insulation plus a comfortable, flexible fit that's built for speed, the sleeveless women's Camaro Speedskin 7/8 wetsuit is ideal for triathlon training or other open-water sports. Lightweight 2mm Softskin neoprene features a dynamic cut for superior performance; sleeveless design encourages free range of motion for fast, efficient strokes. Smooth-skin seals around armholes and legs help retain warmth and maintain snug fit. Mock-turtleneck opening provides close seal while swimming. Camaro Speedskin 7/8 wetsuit features a durable coil back zipper. Closeout.
short_description: Offering efficient insulation plus a comfortable, flexible fit that's built for speed, the sleeveless women's Camaro Speedskin 7/8 wetsuit is ideal for triathlon training or other open-water sports.
